dimensions.label: Critical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach complex problems by breaking them down into their individual components and examining each part in detail.
Your FarTwin will consider the entirety of a situation or issue, taking into account all relevant factors and relationships.

dimensions.label: Technical Proficiency
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle technical issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will possess a high level of expertise in the use and troubleshooting of technology, often being able to fix complex problems quickly and efficiently.
Your FarTwin will have a basic understanding of how to use technology, but may struggle with more complex technical issues or be overwhelmed by advanced concepts.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaborations as a means to an end, focusing on achieving their own goals and may be willing to step on others to get ahead.
Your FarTwin will prioritize the success of the team or group, working collaboratively to achieve common objectives and support one another's efforts.

dimensions.label: Emotional Regulation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be able to recognize and regulate their own emotions, maintaining a stable emotional state even in challenging situations.
Your FarTwin may struggle to manage their emotions, leading to mood swings or explosive outbursts when they feel overwhelmed or frustrated.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb and process new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach learning as a analytical exercise, breaking down complex concepts into their individual components and examining each part in detail.
Your FarTwin will consider the entirety of a subject or topic, taking in information through a more intuitive or experiential process rather than focusing on individual details.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, often taking the initiative to initiate conversations or connect with new people.
Your FarTwin may prefer to interact with others in more low-key settings, preferring to observe or listen rather than actively participating in social interactions.

dimensions.label: Career Orientation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to succeed in their chosen field, often setting high goals and working diligently to achieve them.
Your FarTwin may have a more laid-back approach to their career, prioritizing personal fulfillment over professional advancement or financial success.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly organized and efficient in their time management, often using tools or techniques to maximize productivity.
Your FarTwin may have a more relaxed approach to time management, prioritizing flexibility over punctuality or strict adherence to schedules.
